uid.description: The unique identifier of the staff notification.

staff_uid.description: The unique identifier of the staff member associated with this notification.

notification_template_code_name.description: The code name identifying the notification template to be used.

locale.description: The language locale for the notification content.

params.description: Additional parameters for populating notification templates.

value.description: The value of the parameter. Can be a string, object, number, or boolean.

created_at.description: The date and time when the staff notification was created, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the staff notification was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

status.description: The current status of the staff notification.

content.description: List of key-value pairs containing notification content elements.

key.description: The parameter name for this content element.

value.description: The value of the parameter. Can be a string, object, number, or boolean.

channel.description: The channel through which the staff notification is delivered.
